entry.title: Friday: Chance of showers. High 23. POP 40%
entry.summary: Sunny early this morning then a mix of sun and cloud with 40 percent chance of showers this afternoon. Risk of a thunderstorm late this afternoon. High 23. UV index 6 or high. Forecast issued 5:00 AM EDT Friday 12 May 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Showers. Low 6.
entry.summary: Showers. Risk of a thunderstorm early this evening. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h near midnight. Low 6. Forecast issued 5:00 AM EDT Friday 12 May 2023
